    • Method Detail

      • setPath

        public void setPath(java.lang.String path)
        Registers the path of excel file.
        Parameters:
        path - a string containing the path giving the location of excel file

      • longMethod

        public void longMethod(int locThreshold,
                       int cycloThreshold)
        Updates the is_long_method_by_rules field in each method of the methods list if they meet both of the thresholds.
        Parameters:
        locThreshold - the threshold for the number of lines of code of method
        cycloThreshold - the threshold for the cyclomatic complexity of the method
        See Also:
        MethodData.setIs_long_method_by_rules(boolean)

      • feature_envy

        public void feature_envy(double atfdThreshold,
                         double laaThreshold,
                         java.lang.String andOr)
        Updates the is_feature_envy_by_rules field in each method of the list of methods if they meet the required thresholds, either in conjunction or separately.
        Parameters:
        atfdThreshold - the threshold for the number of method accesses to methods of other classes
        laaThreshold - the threshold for the number of method accesses to attributes of the class itself
        andOr - ("and" or "or") a string to select whether both of the thresholds needs to be met or only one
        See Also:
        MethodData.setIs_feature_envy_by_rules(boolean)

      • defectDetection

        public void defectDetection()
        Detects defects in each method in the methods list, as defined in the excel file.
        See Also:
        checkErrorIdentifiers(boolean, boolean, int[]), GUI.receiveOutputDefectDetection(int[], int[])

      • defectDetectionDefinedRules

        public void defectDetectionDefinedRules(int number)
        Detects defects in each method in the methods list, chosen by the user in the graphical interface. Informs the graphical interface of the counters.
        Parameters:
        number - (0 or 1) identifies if checking for defects in long method(0) or feature envy(1)
        See Also:
        checkErrorIdentifiers(boolean, boolean, int[]), GUI.receiveOutputDefectDetectionDefinedRules(String, int[])

      • checkErrorIdentifiers

        private int[] checkErrorIdentifiers(boolean islong,
                                    boolean iplasmaOrPmdOrDefRules,
                                    int[] counters)
        Increments a defect detection value if applicable.
        Parameters:
        islong - boolean to define whether the method is long(true) of feature envy(false)
        iplasmaOrPmdOrDefRules - boolean to additively specify which defect counter is increment
        counters - the array with the counters of defects
        Returns:
        the update counters array

      • loadFile

        public void loadFile()
        Register data from excel file. Starts by clearing data in the methodsData list and proceeds iterating through rows and cells to create a method from each row of data from excel file.

      • getFileName

        public java.lang.String getFileName()
        Returns:
        the string that contains the file name

      • getMethodsData

        public java.util.List<MethodData> getMethodsData()
        Returns:
        the list of methods
